data.name: RPG Maker MV - Animations Select - Dark
data.detailed_description:
Animations Select is a series of premium animation asset packs designed to provide game designers with flexible and affordable options to upgrade specific areas of their projects. Unlike Animations Collection, the focus of each Animations Select is much narrower; the former provides breadth, the latter provides depth.

Animations Select - Dark features 10 stunning effect animations revolving around the pack's theme. Embrace the darkness and plunge heroes and foes alike into the abyss!

Features:

* 2 casting animations.
* 6 skill animations.
* 2 full-screen skill animations.
* 60 FPS and 30 FPS versions of each animation, for a total of 20 animation sheets.
* Includes Demo Project (RPG Maker MV only) for easy copy/paste implementation into your project right out of the box.

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
